description: Community Based Livelihoods Recovery Programme for Earthquake Affected Areas of Azad Jammu and Kashmir (AJK) and NWFP.

subproject.corporate outcome: National and local institutions have the capacity to respond to gender-based violence and to increase women’s civic engagement, participation and leadership in crisis prevention, ongoing crisis and post-crisis contexts
subproject.description: Community Based Livelihoods Recovery Programme  is established for rehabilitation of affected livelihoods in the earthquake 2005 affected Tehsils of Muzaffarabad and Balakot.
subproject.gender code: No noticeable contribution to gender equality
